website_summaries.verdict: This top-notch drain cleaner is simple to use and won't break your budget.
pros: Consists primarily of pure lye beads that are biodegradable and enable you to safely clean out grease traps, septic systems, and cesspools
Drain cleaner instantly moves to the bottom of standing water to break up blockages
Includes an odorless, non-acid formula that won't damage your pipes or fixtures
cons: Less effective than comparable drain cleaners

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY IT, it will clog your pipe, picture proof
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item and it almost cost me hundreds of $ for repair The lye bead WILL NOT fully dissolve , and the remaining will form up and clog the pipe. Glad I am somewhat handy , still took me half a day and a drain snake to unclog the pipe. See pictures for details: I use the glass as example. The bead does not dissolve completing even by using hot water. And the 2nd picture shows how firm the clog will be.
customer_reviews.author: The guinea pig

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is the best! Cuts through the most clogged drain. Tip - pour some boiling water into drain and then add the lye. let sit for a bit then pour more boiling water. Works better than any other drain opener I have tried
customer_reviews.author: DeRenee29

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: Oh my God. The restaurant’s sewers are blocked but you can still run slowly. Yesterday, I received 2 bottles and also put hot water first in the pipeline and poured 2 bottles. The result was completely blocked. I was so mad that I had no choice but to find someone to make $485. 😭😭
customer_reviews.author: Jayden

customer_reviews.title: Congealed like wax
customer_reviews.text: My husband used this last night. It COMPLETELY clogged the drains, and we ended up with double sinks full of water. He just finished draining the pipes, took them apart, and this stuff CONGEALED in the pipes. It was like a layer of wax, and there was no way water could penetrate it. Please read the critical reviews, and believe them. Unless you're handy with taking pipes apart, or you have a plumber friend on standby, we do not recommend you buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: USA Patriot

customer_reviews.title: Works great but hardened in my sink
customer_reviews.text: Cleaned my bathroom sink but the lye completely hardened and clogged my kitchen sink... has to research how to clear it out since a acrwwedriver and hammer didn’t work. Literally it can become like a rock. I ended up boiling water and putting it down the drain a few times then finally is dissolved and cleared... thought I’d have to get a plumber over to rip it apart! All in all it works unless it doesn’t ... then it hardens.
customer_reviews.author: Karebear

customer_reviews.title: The Real Deal
customer_reviews.text: In my experience this is the only drain clearing product that actually works. Just follow the directions, get some hot water in the drain, pour in a little pure lye and stand back. There will be some gurgling noises and perhaps some vapors coming out of the drain and when all that stops your drain is clear.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Solidified like concrete in my drain
customer_reviews.text: Like the other 1 star ratings, I followed the instructions and had the product solidify like concrete in my drain pipe right under the kitchen sink strainer. This happened in the 15 minutes on the label after pouring 4 ounces of the stuff in the drain. I could not hammer a screw driver through the blockage, and the hot water on top did not dissolve it. Eventually the pounding on the strainer's tail pipe broke it from the strainer requiring about $25 worth of replacement parts. My formerly slow running drain became totally blocked. Does not work as described! Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: John Friend

customer_reviews.title: Soap making
customer_reviews.text: I used this for my first experience making bar soap. I didn’t expect much since I had no experience but the soap turned out really good! It got stains out of my carpet that I didn’t know could come out! It also got my husband’s hands completely clean after working on the greasy car engine. I prefer liquid soap for laundry. I tried this grated up in the wash with washing soda but I really prefer liquid soap so I need the other kind of lye for that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Sizzles a drain open fast
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is the real deal, but follow directions and wear goggles. This stuff probably isn't the strongest you could get as a professional plumber or such but it's much stronger than most off the shelf stuff you can get at the store. Some folks say it clogs up or doesn't dissolve; they probably didn't follow the directions. This stuff has worked great for me, I've used it to open up slow drains and used it to maintain drains. Set a timer, I wouldn't want this stuff sitting in my pipes longer than it says to.
customer_reviews.author: Walter F.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing at clearing a shower drain
customer_reviews.text: I have been using your typical draino-esque products for the last year on my slow shower drain. Every few months I would throw half a bottle down there and it would be "fine". Not great. But better. I used this Lye yesterday and it was AMAZING. After pouring some down the drain it sounded like a demon was being slain in my shower drain, and I was concerned. After about 15 minutes I poured a teapot of hot water down the drain and the demon was no more. When taking a shower that night it was like the clog never existed! Way better AND cheaper than draino and stuff like that. A+
customer_reviews.author: WCD

customer_reviews.title: Arrived open, ruined, but cannot return.
customer_reviews.text: See photo. I received an open, defective container that I can't return and there's no option to request refund! I can not use this because There's no way to know how long the seal has been broken or why, or what the chemical composition is now that it's been exposed to humidity and carbon dioxide. See photo and check your seals to be sure yours are not eaten through like this - If you are making soap you can not use this as the moisture and carbonate content will change everything unpredictably.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent.

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Trust This Product
customer_reviews.text: This product literally does the opposite of what it is advertised for. The directions recommend that you run warm water throught the pipes before pour in the product then wait fifteen minutes. Running the water causes the "beads" to stick to the pipes and surface, the fifteen minutes is supposed to be time for the product to process, but it results in the beads sticking to things, and then when you run additional water, they don't dissolve. You basically just further clog your pipes or drains. Highly UNRECOMMENDED.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: this stuff is horrible and it smells
customer_reviews.text: this stuff ruined my sink. I followed the instructions listed on bottle and instead of clearing my bathroom sink it crated a cement like block which i have to call in a plumber to remove! The block is so hard that my building maintenance man could not remove it after drilling for a half hour.
customer_reviews.author: seidox

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: When we bought our 100+ year old home in August of 2018, the downstairs tub was clogged. We assumed it was either due to old pipes or weird, old plumbing. We tried so many things to try to unclog the tub but water would always take hours to drain. We were going to call a plumber to see what our options were when we remodeled the bathroom next year but happened to see this product and try it. For $6, it was worth a shot. This stuff is amazing. It cleared it right up, water no longer stands in the tub, it has cleared years and years worth of build-up with half of a container. I definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sara W.

customer_reviews.title: It actually works!
customer_reviews.text: I used this product in my bathroom sink, where I believe the main problem was hair. It was not completely plugged, but it was draining very slowly. I used this as instructed, and now it drains like it was new. I am very satisfied with this product even though I was originally very skeptical because I don't think I've ever found a DIY product that actually works well before. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: ... my cold and hot process soap making - Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: I use this for both my cold and hot process soap making - Works like a charm! Never had any issues whatsoever - great quality.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: May work for you...
customer_reviews.text: We had a very stubborn blockage in a house we recently purchased. We attempted many recommendations we found online to no avail. I read a review on a handyman troubleshooting type page and saw ComStar Lyme mentioned as working well for them. I bought it, arriving fast, used it multiple times finished off the container. I'll admit I wasn't all that excited when reading container to wear gloves, toxic, no skin contact, deadly... yeah. Our complete blockage had improved to more of a slowdown but at least this did open up the drain, some. Afraid we'll have to end up hiring a plumber after all for this 100 year old home with old pipes.
customer_reviews.author: McD

customer_reviews.title: Works really well
customer_reviews.text: I own a restaurant and it’s amazing what people put into my floor drains... I am extremely satisfied using this product. However, be careful. An employee had dumped a bunch of crap down the floor drain so I used the this product. There was already water back up so I just poured it in. Let it sit, dumped hot water over it. It went down slowly still, so after several rinses with hot water, I used the lye again. This time it made a small geyser, this was the first time I was not gloved up with my face covered... but I was standing so about 5.5 feet away from the drain. (I will not do that again!)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This stuff WORKS on even toughest drains
customer_reviews.text: I am never buying any other product! This stuff opened up a drain that liquid cleaner didn't and it worked fast. It is poisionous so be sure to keep away from children or pets!! Super easy to use, you warm the drain if you can, put 1/4 to 1 cup in and let it rest. Then flush with hot water. It cleared a drain that was super clogged perfectly. Very content with this drain opener and no clue why I didn't start using it before!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Would not use again
customer_reviews.text: Both kitchen sinks draining SLOW, then almost stopped completely After scooping water out I put this in. Smoke rose up, yeah, I thought it was going to work. NO, both drains clogged dead. I then attempted to run a plastic snake however it just hit something hard, which was the lye that was clogged in drain. Had to call a plumber. Some of the product mixed with water from pipe dripped on wood kitchen floor and discolored the wood in a few spots. Plumber had a hard time disassembling pipe and getting the hard as a brick clog out.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Fixed my shower drain
customer_reviews.text: I had given up hope and had already scheduled the plumber for later in the day. I used this product according to instructions 3 times, using the plunger and copious amount of hot water on this completely blocked drain. It slowly drained at first, I kept at it and after the third treatment and vigorous plunging the satisfying sound of water getting sucked down the drain was finally heard. I was persistent as other users had recommended, and stayed with it, with success as my reward. Needless to say, I cancelled the plumber.
customer_reviews.author: youwoo

customer_reviews.title: Didn't do a thing
customer_reviews.text: Following the directions for a VERY slow, mostly plugged shower drain, this did literally nothing. Two applications, nothing. I was hoping this would be the thing that finally worked on this drain, because nothing else is working on it either. But sadly, this was just as ineffective as everything else. I know it is possible to unplug this drain, because it has been unplugged before using Draino, but this time is different.
customer_reviews.author: FullmoonCat

customer_reviews.title: My drains were clogged for 4 years, NO LIE
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so I was like let me try this because, my right side of my house had problems with clogged pipes from the previous owners since I have been here almost 5 years. Crazy but the plumber wanted over 6 00.00 to clean my pipes out. So I have used everything and nothing worked. I was going nuts, the sinks were backing up and not draining and the bathroom sinks and tub were backing up when someone did dishes in the kitchen. I used 3 bottles of this stuff, figured it would take maybe more, but 3 did the trick and it says to use this once a month. MY PLUMBING IS CLEARRRRRRRRRRRR, so happy!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders in my bathroom sink, tub, and kitchen sink
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this stuff for years. Have always had a spare bottle on hand because it works wonders. I’ve found that it’s been more effective than the popular Drano. I don’t know why, but it does. Every once in awhile a clog will happen either in the bathroom sink, tub, or kitchen sink. I use this stuff and it clears it right up. Yes, it’s even worked in the kitchen sink. Whoever invented this, is a genius. That's all I can say.
customer_reviews.author: K Dude

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: So, a family member said his bathtub had been unusable for a year. He "tried" everything and it would cost hundreds of dollars for a plumber to come out and snake. I did three treatments over a 2 day period, leaving it in over night on two of those days. After pouring boiling water down the pipe, the clog was completely gone and the bathtub now drains. Maybe I should go in the plumbing business? Seems I could make some money on this $9 investment. Anyway, it works. I'll never buy any other drain cleaner/unclogger again. This was too fast and easy to bother with other products.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works efficiently
customer_reviews.text: After doing an experiment in plastic cup I figured to use it in the following way: Run hot water for a minute then pour in lye beads then pour in about half cup hot water ( try not to dilute it too much) then leave it overnight then run hot water next day. The drain clog was gone. Amazing. According to my experiment the lye beads works well in hot water and works in room temperature water too but it takes longer time to dissolve the hair in room temperature water. The instructions on the bottle is not accurate.
customer_reviews.author: amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: It works on greesed up kitchen sink pipes!!!
customer_reviews.text: Tried everything thing even a 25 ft electric snake.. I'm guessing I has greese around the walls of my pipe.. I had a hell of a time fighting with a slow backed up sink and i have ordered and used many liquid cleaners but none did the job as fast and efficient as this! I filled the directions and said I didn't have any faith in a powder/Crystal form but I was very wrong and will not have to call the plumber after all to fix my kitchen sink drain... Great price and it worked for me!!!!
customer_reviews.author: LisaEastCoastGurl

customer_reviews.title: Worked like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Had a slow-draining bathroom sink. I first used the Green Gobbler sticks, that stuff was useless. Then I tried the plastic drain snake, but it wasn't getting anything, so the clog was deeper than I thought. Then I ordered this, mixed some of the lye with water, and poured it down the drain. Plugged the stopper. Left it there for about half an hour, and then flushed it with hot water. Worked like magic. The only caution is to make sure you don't inhale any of the vapors, because it burns.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Preston Jorgensen

customer_reviews.title: Follow directions and it works like a dream
customer_reviews.text: Worked on my 92 yr old massively clogged tub drain (I have very long curly hair that wreaks havoc on drains). I read and followed the instructions- which should save you from some of the horror stories in the comments (specifically getting a lye brick in your pipes lol). Dissolved first in hot water before pouring down the drain. Took two tries before the drain cleared, but now it flows like brand new. Used almost entire bottle- still way cheaper than a plumber.
customer_reviews.author: JenniferM

customer_reviews.title: Literally made my situation worse with each application.
customer_reviews.text: Well it was a somewhat slow clog. Went with the directions specifically and left it over night. Well Im guessing it cleaned the pipes leading to the clog so well it has now almost completely clogged the pipe. Tried going even stronger of a dose the second time for about 9 hrs and now it's so plugged up nothing is getting through at all, not even a little bit. I'm sure there are plenty of scenarios that this may work well but not mine.
customer_reviews.author: B TO THE P

customer_reviews.title: This Product Works!!!
customer_reviews.text: My drain was severely clogged. I tried Drano crystals, which is usually my go to product. It didn't work. This stuff did. I heated up the pipe as per the instructions. I poured the required amount down the drain and allowed it to sit in the pipe for about 15 to 20 minutes. I turned the hot water on, and after about a minute or two I heard a gushing sound in the pipe as if something forced it's way down the drain. Then the water began flowing freely WITH NO CLOG!!! I am very happy with this product and will use it for routine maintenance.
customer_reviews.author: Momof3

customer_reviews.title: It's lye
customer_reviews.text: It's pure lye, melts aluminum with no issues. Not really sure how else to review lye. It will clean your pipes, help you make hydrogen, put a new season on cast iron or clean your stove, everyone should keep some in the cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Michael M.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I live in a craftsman built in 1932. A few weeks ago the drain from my upstairs bathroom became totally clogged. After trying a rooter and a couple different drain cleaning products I gave up and called a plumber. The estimate to "replace my stack" was almost $16,000. I procrastinated but was ready to order the work when I happened to see reviews of Pure Lye Bead Drain Opener. I bought three lbs. and mixed three or four quarts, which I poured down the drain at intervals over a couple of days. To make a long story short, the water is swirling and I'm $16,000 to the good.
customer_reviews.author: Basil T Sprague

customer_reviews.title: It Opened my Drain
customer_reviews.text: I have used various forms/manufacturers of Lye in the past with good results on those tough drain and pipe issues. ComStar Pure Lye does a good job. I had a grease clogged drain in the kitchen sink, draining very slow. I prepped by pouring almost boiling water down the drain, and as it was slowly draining, added about 1/2 cup of ComStar Pure Lye. Waited about 20 minutes and flushed with hot tap water. Magic! Drain is now open. Recommended, I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: L. Peters

customer_reviews.title: MUST BUY!
customer_reviews.text: BEST STUFF EVER! My double kitchen sink completely blocked, took a long long time to drain. I had tried Liquid Drano and Draino Max gel, but nothing budging. I bought this based on other reviews. Got it today, open the package, tried to let hot water run in the sink and drain to warm pipes. Poured in a quarter cup of the powder on each side of sink- in the low standing water. Prepared to wait 15-20 minutes as suggested, I turned to do something else and was shocked that within 2 minutes I heard the sink garggle and break loose. I treated sink a second time for good measure. Sink works wonderfully!!! Will buy again. Great price, Fabulous product!!
customer_reviews.author: Simple Life

customer_reviews.title: Be Careful
customer_reviews.text: This is very reactive and can burn you easily if the instructions are not followed closely. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Coal

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!!! Grocery store and even Home ...
customer_reviews.text: WOW!!!! Grocery store and even Home depot profressional grade drain cleaners can't compare to this stuff...our home is over 40 years old and despite replacing part of the show drain pipe..approx 60% constricted with gunk....I failed to clean out the remainder of the pipe....nonetheless, as time went on the drain got slower and slower......Draino and it's cousins really do that much..but I finally used this product out of frustration and Success! Caution: READ ALL instructions and follow them...this is dangerous stuff.. If your house has galvanized drain pipes (yes old house as I mentioned)....make sure your OVER FLUSH with fresh water...you don't want this stuff eating through everything!
customer_reviews.author: H. Park

customer_reviews.title: Use for soap
customer_reviews.text: This is fine beads, it works well but the beads do bounce up when pouring so you need to be very careful. I'm not sure I would buy again because of the size of the beads but I haven;t been making soap very long and will need to try other bead size. I might come back to this - I think its a matter of preference. No discoloration and was well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Kasara

customer_reviews.title: Second time ordering this product as my daughter is a ...
customer_reviews.text: Second time ordering this product as my daughter is a hypervigilant, die hard, nazi enviornmentalist who only uses organic products! She can smell chemicals from a mile away! Even though we have seperate residences, I burn with guilt every time I even think about using non organics. Praise God there is no detectable smell, or I would be getting a grand lecture on the evils of chemical pollution. To make a long story short, because it works so well, I will buy again and again as long as I have clogged drains.
customer_reviews.author: AnnieTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Worked great!
customer_reviews.text: I've had a slow running shower drain for years and have usually used a pressure bladder to clean it out, along with hot water and Draino, but it would take much time with this method to get my drain running faster. I did two treatments with Pure Lye, and it worked great. Quick and easy to use, and my shower drain is still working fine after several weeks. Years ago, I was told by a plumber that the pipes needed replacing which was going to run big bucks; try Pure Lye first before you spend a fortune on a new drain line.
customer_reviews.author: D H

customer_reviews.title: Ignore the directions
customer_reviews.text: The directions tell you to pour 1/2-1 cup of lye in your drain--you should NEVER pour that much lye in! Dissolve about a 1-2 tablespoons in very hot water and pour THAT slowly into your drain and cover it with a metal pan/plate in case things bubble up. These directions are dangerous. 1 cup of undissolved lye can fuse with your damp pipe and S trap almost immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon M. Arvesen

customer_reviews.title: Lye Lump Dissolves Pipe Dreams, Nothing Else
customer_reviews.text: Completely clogged my sink. I followed the instructions exactly but it still formed a hard chunk in my bathroom sink drain pipe. I used Thrift before and didn’t have this problem, so I figured this product would work too. But instead, now I need a plumber. I’m so sad.
customer_reviews.author: AMO

customer_reviews.title: Did not work.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why product did not work. I essentially wound up using entire bottle. I had a slow flowing drain and added this. Drain became worse and completely blocked up. Had to go a auger the drain and drain line to open things up. A chemical treatment is not always the solution.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. D.

customer_reviews.title: Burns away the dirt...
customer_reviews.text: My bathroom sink keeps getting clogged every couple of weeks. I have tried using plunger and it helps for a few days, and it slows days in a few days. This Lye Drain Opener worked like a miracle, just a cap full and the drain sizzled like hot lava and cleared up. Its been almost 3 weeks now and the drain has not choked up yet. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Saurav

customer_reviews.title: The effect is remarkable!
customer_reviews.text: I just received it half an hour ago and started using it immediately! The inside of the open package is white crystal. Pour it into the sewer and you can hear some hissing noise. Then it's through!! The whole process is less than one minute! Ten seconds solved the problem that troubled me for a week! It took only a minute and $6 to get beyond my expectations! That is great! I probably only used the amount of a lid. Such a jar seems to last a long time! Super happy!
customer_reviews.author: Jiayuan

customer_reviews.title: This is the only product I spend money on for my drains
customer_reviews.text: I've tried several other products in the past, but I won't waste my money on anything else anymore. This works on slow drains or completely clogged drains. I've only used it in my shower, so I'm assuming my hair is the cause of the clogs. So I can't vouch for other types of clogs, but this is the best stuff out there for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Amazing stuff!
customer_reviews.text: WOW! Used this on 2 stubborn bathroom sink drains that were not just slow, but stopped up. Had to mix lye with water first and then let it sit in the drain overnight. The water lye mixture gets HOT. I didn't have any explosion, but had a bucket over the drain just in case. In the morning it took a few times of letting the faucet run before it cleared. I would buy this again, definitely.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Patel

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for soap making.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this lye several times now to make multiple batches of soap. I've used it in cold & hot process and I have not had a single issue. The first bottle I ordered (single bottle) had lye flakes, but the second order (2 1-lb bottles) had lye pellets. I prefer the pellets as there is less chance to spill or breath in the dust.
customer_reviews.author: JennMe013

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: After reading several reviews, I decided to try this for our sinks that weren't draining. I read that you should pour 1 cup into the drain and then pour a quart of boiling water in the drain. Let me tell you, this stuff works! It bubbled and all of a sudden there was a sucking sound and down it went! The sinks now drain like brand new!! I am going to try this at my mom's house that I just inherited because her basement bathroom sink hasn't drained properly for years.
customer_reviews.author: Sara S

customer_reviews.title: Solid product
customer_reviews.text: So don't leave it in your drain with cool water building in top of it or it'll turn to concrete and you'll have to take apart the entire drain to get it out. Also wear gloves, this stuff burns. Also if you get some on your socks, change socks immediately and don't wait a few hours ignoring the tingling in your foot. Overall though, unclogged my drain and didn't kill me, so I'd say its a solid product.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Lockhart

customer_reviews.title: Buy it it works great!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is worth it’s weight in gold. I honestly think some of the bad reviews on here is because of user error. I used this on a really clogged drain and shower and it works like a dream! Buy it, wayyyy better than draino or other products.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Fajardo

customer_reviews.title: Very, Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The first time I ordered this product in 2013; it worked. Now that the formula has been changed to "The New and Improved with it"s changed beads" it did not work at all for me. The directions were followed to a "T" just as they were when I purchased it in 2013. Will not purchase this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: Works 100%
customer_reviews.text: I had two clogged drains. One was slow moving, the other was completely clogged. The slow moving drain was cleared on the first application. The clogged drain needed two but that was only because water couldn’t even move though the drain. I followed the directions and have two freely flowing drains now with very little effort on my part. VERY happy with this product. I’m adding it to my subscribe and save because using small amounts regularly will keep your pipes from every becoming clogged.
customer_reviews.author: M. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Made kitchen sink clog worse
customer_reviews.text: Used as recommended for kitchen sink clog. The residue created by this lye, combined with the grease buildup in the kitchen sink drain, has made the clog much worse. The sink will not drain at all now.
customer_reviews.author: Lotus

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great with soap! I just used coconut oil, olive oil and citrous scent.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Y.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for slow drains
customer_reviews.text: My water pressure is low so I get build up in my drains faster because it drains slower. This is perfect for dissolving the soap and gunk that accumulates. I've been using it sparingly for years and have never had any complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Singreen

customer_reviews.title: Testimonial
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t feel like it worked so I used the whole bottle the same day but otherwise followed directions. Saw a very MINIMAL impact first 3 days but I only took showers. Decided to get a bath the fourth day and I filled the tub with very hot water. I had to leave suddenly and drained the tub almost as soon as it was full. The tub drained IMMEDIATELY and I haven’t had problems since. I would say the key is to make sure to flush the pipes with a lot of hot water the next few days after using to improve your results.
customer_reviews.author: Destiny Emmons

customer_reviews.title: Works great, super strong - be careful
customer_reviews.text: I've used this regularly for a few years now for clogged shower drains. It works very well. I use only a small amount at a time and 1lb will go a long way as long as it's used judiciously. Read and follow the instructions. There's not much to it, it's poured in and let to stand in the drain, then flushed after a few minutes. Definitely recommended for the average clogged drain.
customer_reviews.author: Artem

customer_reviews.title: It just works.
customer_reviews.text: Not quite sure why Scent is on here as a review but seriously don’t breathe the fumes and have a window or exhaust fan going if possible. Living in a house with two other women you get clogs in the shower, and in the sink. This cleaned it up fast and the drains run like new again. This is my third bottle in about as many years but it works I will buy another next year unless they shave their heads and preferably not in the shower.
customer_reviews.author: Mongo

customer_reviews.title: It got the job done fast and easy!
customer_reviews.text: I had a stubborn clogged sink drain in my master bathroom. I did snaking, drain cleaners, hot water and nothing worked. My drain was slow to drain and when shaving or brushing teeth within minutes it would start backing up into the sink. Used this product due to the reviews and figured $5 what the heck why not! I’ve already been suggesting this to neighbors and family! This stuff did wonders! It cleaned the drain and with little ease! Pour the right amount in, let sit 15 minutes and then flush with hot water. Simple, fast and does the job! Awesome product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ian B.

customer_reviews.title: Works in drains, works in soap making it goes a long way.
customer_reviews.text: We had a clogged shower and this cleaned it right out in very little time. I also used it for making some soaps from left over tallow that's been in my kitchen forever. Those came out great too. It doesn't take much Lye to unclog a drain or to make soap and since it sits under the sink forever I'd suggest giving soap making a try too. This goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Yummyjackalmeat

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: This is the only thing that unclogged my sink after 10 years of trying everything. I will continue to buy this and only this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Read directions very carefully
customer_reviews.text: Did not like this product. I probably should have used more hot water after putting down the drain, but it turned to concrete. Had to take the drain apart and soak in boiling hot water just to get it put back together. Beware, use lots of hot water after putting Crystal's in the drain.
customer_reviews.author: GP

customer_reviews.title: ARRGGHH! I should have purchased TWO pounds!
customer_reviews.text: My bathroom sink has been stopped up, fully clogged, whatever you’d like to say, for almost one full year. I know why... it’s where I trim my facial hair (until I have little or none), it’s where I shave, etc. The drain is/was clogged with hair! So, I used this product and it helped, it really helped... just not enough to allow complete drainage. I’m going to order TWO bottles this time (it is odd that ordering two bottles seems much more expensive than ordering two 1-pound bottle separately) and will, hopefully, get the JOB DONE before Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: C B D

customer_reviews.title: Harmful and dangerous!
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my bathtub. Admittedly it is a very powerful product but really harmful to human body at the same time. I use the goggles and gloves as instruction but breathed in the scent accidentally, then I had a difficult breathing and dizziness. It said “ avoid breathing the vapor” but I don’t really understand how could I avoid it. I mean, it’s vapor that spreads in the air!! So buy a safer product, for your health!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Wow does this stuff work! Both my tub and sink were slightly clogged/slow drain. I ran hot water then put the stuff in the drain. (I used way less then what it called for and it worked just the same so don't waste product!) After I put the stuff in I poured hot water down the drain. I heard a pretty weird "glupph!" noise and that was it! Drain unclogged.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Worked great - drain flowing freely!
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and was a little nervous about using the product based on some of the reviews and the gloves/glasses warnings. I followed the directions exactly and after 15-20 minutes had a free-flowing drain. This shower/tub drain had been slow for over a year, since we moved in the house. We tried Draino and other household products with little to temporary results. This product appears to have cleared the clog. It’s been almost two months and there is no slowing.
customer_reviews.author: Nick in GA

customer_reviews.title: Unclogs even toughest hair bunches
customer_reviews.text: I tried two bottles of liquid plumber and they could not dissolve my hair clogged drains. This stuff cleared clog almost instantaneously and kept the drain running clear!
customer_reviews.author: J. Heil

customer_reviews.title: It works !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, went for years with a slow drain in the shower getting even slower. Thought about calling in the plumber but decided to give it one more try myself. This stuff worked the first time ! I did a second treatment just in case. Now I'm showering with the water actually going down drain instead of backing up around my ankles. It works !!
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Forget those store bought liquid plumber/drano/etc, use this instead.
customer_reviews.text: What my purpose of drain clearing, it works wonders. Forget those store bought liquid plumber/drano/etc, use this instead. More powerful and clear drains faster. Great for preventive maintenance too. That what I do nowadays to prevent my cast drains from backing up which is very often due to age and kids with long hair, lol.
customer_reviews.author: Dave W

customer_reviews.title: Worked...after some time,  but definitely  worked
customer_reviews.text: Worked...after some time, but definitely worked. Did first application and it was a no go. Did 2nd application and left over night and in the morning was still clog and I was initially mad. Then i decided to try yo plunge and wha-la all the water went down. I ran hot water aftereards for 10 minutes. All is good so far... no need to call a plumber.
customer_reviews.author: JO

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Worked well, good for septic. Actually had an additional problem that required one of those sewer tapes. But this sure cleaned everything else out. If I use this type of product again will search for larger container. In my small town folks at Lowe's don't even know what it does, they just wanted me to look at their "drain cleaners" and had no idea what was in them. People just don't even know about chemistry anymore, just buy what is on the shelf . . I think it is a shame people lose basic knowledge of old fashioned chemicals like lye.
customer_reviews.author: Karen N

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for unclogging the drains in my bathroom sink and shower. Follow the directions and you'll have no problem. Between my daughter and myself we have a lot of hair that ends up in the sinks. My drains smelled terrible and this took care of the problem right away.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Lyn

customer_reviews.title: Directions included in review.
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. I tried other products on my drains and they made no difference. This worked on both drains the very first time and now they are draining quickly. The only issue I had is there is a label over the directions so I had to search for them online. The directions are.... Run hot water down the drain for 5 minutes, make sure there is no standing water and add one cup of lye (half of the container), let stand for one minute and then run hot water through the drain again (I used boiling water I started heating up before I started the process). Hopefully this helps someone.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: WORKS AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! I have used everything..from Drano to sulfuric acid (brand Hot Shot which I highly discourage as it burnt a hole in my metal drain) and nothing worked on my slow kitchen drain. I have an older house, built in 1963, and was at the point of using boiling water every other day. I used a cup of this other per the directions and at first nothing. Then I used a sauce pan of boiling water to flush and BAM...I heard the reaction coming back the pipe! Quickly I turned on both hot and cold and away she went! Works great now
customer_reviews.author: Mark A.

customer_reviews.title: OMG! AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered BIODA an enzyme product that absolutley did not work. Bought Drano.... NOPE. Nothing either. I bought this as a a last chance before I had to have my landlord or some other unknown oerson come in and snake the pipe. THIS worked like a charm. Ordering another JIC. 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Judy Redington

customer_reviews.title: The only thing that's unclogged my tub
customer_reviews.text: Our tub has been backing up for weeks. I'm sick of showering in ankle deep water. We've used several bottles of extra strength Drano and after a day or so, it kept clogging back up. It's been almost 2 weeks since we used the lye in our drain and no clogs!! You do need to read the directions very carefully! They are very specific. This is some hard core stuff that can damage your pipes or cause bodily harm if not used correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yes, later on I will get another jug
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to tell on this...Upon initial application it did smoke and steam a bit. Initial snaking and then re - snaking with a bit bigger snake did nothing. And the lye did not open up the drain any more than it already was. But I think that this was my particular drain. I really think that with a normally clogged drain that this lye would have ate thru it like sh*t through a goose. I think mine was just a weird mixture of a strange set up, some type of trap, and maybe even tree roots in the line. I have full confidence that this stuff would work wonders in the average clogged line.
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS NOW!!! Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic results! I had a tub drain that I had literally tried EVERY drain cleaner you can buy at a store (no, I’m not exaggerating), and was unsuccessful. We live in a very old apartment that still has copper pipes, and they will literally catch a fart and get backed up. Although our clog was very bad and far back, and I had to use an entire bottle and a half, it finally cleared it!! No other product had been able to! I will definitely be buying more to prevent build up like we had!
customer_reviews.author: 6Lela

customer_reviews.title: I could only use this once!
customer_reviews.text: This worked wonderfully for clearing out a drain full of hair. My only complaint is that when I went to use it again, I cannot get the container open. I'm all for child proof packaging but this is ridiculous. Even my muscular teen son couldn't get it open so it's worthless to me at this point. I need to purchase more to clear out a drain, but unfortunately will have to locate another brand.
customer_reviews.author: leann911

customer_reviews.title: The ONLY thing that has gotten all my drains unclogged
customer_reviews.text: I live with people who have a lot of thick hair and it seems at times like they intentionally put as much of it down the drain as possible. This quickly got the pipes clear and now water flows through again! You only need a small amount, but this is my second time purchasing this.
customer_reviews.author: Christi

customer_reviews.title: Regular use keeps drain clear
customer_reviews.text: This is the only thing that works to clear hair out of drains. Have rental property and constantly dealing with clogged shower drains from hair. Pour a little of this every couple months and it keeps them nice and clear
customer_reviews.author: Owen M.

customer_reviews.title: This really works!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing. Nothing else had worked on my clogged, stubborn drain but after seeing the reviews I decided to give it one final shot before calling a plumber. I poured in the product as directed and followed with hot water and immediately there was some improvement in the flow. After a couple of hours I used it again along with a lot more hot water and within about 5 minutes the drain was perfectly clear. Absolutely no clog left. This is the only drain product I'll use going forward.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great for unclogging sinks and shower drains.
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this for the last couple years and use it regularly to unclog my sink and shower drain. It works great at unclogging and maintaining my drains, but I just wish it came in a bigger container so I didn't have to order the product so often (this is the reason I only gave it 4 stars instead of 5). One container is enough for me to completely unclog my bathroom sink and (very clogged) shower drain 2 times.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Best drain cleaner I've used
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! I've tried all the draino stuff and most of the items you get at home depot, but this stuff is the best for how much it costs. Some of the other items work but you pay for it. You can get the same results for half the price using this Lye.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel E.

customer_reviews.title: Worked better than months worth of other stuff I tried.
customer_reviews.text: I have three drains I used it on. Two of the drains I could actually hear sizzling noises coming from within the depths, obviously the stuff was eating away at something. The third was not nearly so dramatic. I had a horrible smell coming from one drain before I used this that wouldn't go away. After using this stuff - in ample, repeated amounts - I can say I am really pleased. No smells and drains run quickly. This was a good purchase, better than anything else I tried.
customer_reviews.author: H. Wax

customer_reviews.title: It took 2 applications of this (the whole bottle) but sink is finally running great. At first it cleared it most of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Tried to open a bathroom sink drain that had been running really slow for a long time with the usual liquid drain cleaner and it didn’t budge. It took 2 applications of this (the whole bottle) but sink is finally running great. At first it cleared it most of the way but not totally but after two days realized it continued to clear out (maybe further down the line?) and that it is draining the way it is suppose to . Will definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: Raly

customer_reviews.title: Be patience
customer_reviews.text: Just when I was going to give up this product worked. I poured 3/4 to the washer drain at night, let it sit overnight. Next day in the morning I added boiling water and turn on the washer and waited for the water to drain and nope didn't work. I added more boiling water and did the process again. And nope didn't work and I was going to give a review so I waited like an hour or so and I added more boiling water and that's when it worked. I'm glad I waited to give it a 5 star. Will use this stuff from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Worked like a charm on my teenage daughters sink
customer_reviews.text: WOW! Worked like a charm on my teenage daughters sink .. slow drain... Full of hair. Also worked on all my toilets that tend to get backed up if somebody does (a larger than normal number two in them;). So I used this stuff just to clean out any conch left in the pipes. And hopefully I won't have to use it for a while. The house is only 10 years old. Anyway... Highly recommend this stuff. Just make sure that you wear the proper safety protection nothing volcano affected on me but I wasn't going to be " tempting fate" with my vision or skin
customer_reviews.author: James Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Miracle worker!
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant product that FINALLY fixed my slow draining bathroom sink. I had tried everything prior to ordering this. I’ll never be w/o it again!
customer_reviews.author: Daffydil

customer_reviews.title: TRUE STORY: I used to curse my landlord. No more.
customer_reviews.text: The shower/bathtub in my apartment had been slow-draining for a looooong time. I cursed my landlord every time the backed up water touched my feet while taking a shower. I tried using a toilet plunger, which helped only a little bit for a few days. I tried Drano, and that was just literally money down the drain. Then I bough this Pure Lye product, followed the directions, and it worked like a charm! Whatever was clogging the line was melted away, the rats in the sewers are probably all dead, and now my daily showers are curse-free.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Rod

customer_reviews.title: Opened clogged drain very quickly
customer_reviews.text: Since the grocery stores stopped carrying real drainer cleaner, we have struggled. Found this on Amazon. Got it in the Door and 10 minutes later drain was totally clear !!! Works like a charm. Too bad grocery stores are worried about lawsuits over a necessary product like this. Those liquid products don't work at all. Very happy to have my drain working again so quick.
customer_reviews.author: Snooper's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great for soap making
customer_reviews.text: Made some soap with this, little fun project, i was concerned that because it said 99% lye it would not work but it made great soap, it will make the lye solution little yellow instead of clear when dissolved but it's fine it still works
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Dona

customer_reviews.title: Does the Trick, saves you a Plumber Bill!
customer_reviews.text: Use once a month on our shower drains that have very old pipes. Dissolves hair and crud that sneaks down the drain Saving us time and time again on plumber bills. A small price to pay. Can’t live without it!
customer_reviews.author: Elise NJ

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and safe
customer_reviews.text: This is best thing over ever used in our drains. No need for liquid drano or anything super dangerous. Just some hot water and this bottle then some more hot water. Set it up on subscribe and save and it'll just come automatically to keep all the drains in your house clear all the time
customer_reviews.author: Alia

customer_reviews.title: Resolved the draining problem I had years!
customer_reviews.text: I had had a draining problem in my bathroom sink for years, and I tried a lot of drain cleaner products, even hired a plumber, but neither worked. Then I got an information from a friend about this product. I only used for once, and resolved the issue right a way! Five stars!
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Finally Clear !
customer_reviews.text: I've had a slow tub drain for about 2 months...I mixed this product into a soupy solution and let it sit in the drain for 8 hours. It was like a new drain....not even an ounce of back-up or slow down. Be patient It works. =)
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Best product to unclog drains!!
customer_reviews.text: This worked like a charm!!! This was after months of battling a slow bath tub drain, using countless other products and on the verge of spending HUNDREDS in plumbing costs because I was told the drain needed to be replaced. I was amazed that 15 min after pouring the lye down the drain and running some hot water... the problem was fixed!!! My kids were very impressed... they told me I am the best mom ever because I was able to fix the tub!!!
customer_reviews.author: yonis421

customer_reviews.title: Did the trick way better than draino
customer_reviews.text: Glad I read the reviews for this product. I had tried draino before without any results. My kitchen drain had been stuck with food and grease and eventually slowed almost completely. I put about half of the 1 lb bottle and added hot water and about 15 minutes later the drain was as good as new. I don't have a garbage disposal either so it did the trick. I think I did get some second hand fumes though and read up on the danger of pure lye. I definitely recommend having your place well-ventilated and use gloves/goggles and even a mask to avoid breathing the fumes or getting any of the lye on you.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Kim

customer_reviews.title: Used for soap making
customer_reviews.text: New to soap making, my soaps came out great! I recommend any soap maker to use this lye
customer_reviews.author: Rivera family

product_meta.title: ComStar 024924305003 Pure Lye Bead Drain Opener, 1 lb, White
product_meta.description: Color:WhiteComStar 024924305003 Pure Lye Bead Drain Opener, 1 lb, White
feature_bullets: 99% pure lye beads, industrial strength, biodegradable, food grade
Clears out drains, grease traps, septic systems and cesspools safely
Does NOT contain needless fillers, dyes or water
Odorless non-acid formula is safe on fine fixtures, chrome trim and plastic pipes
Ideal for soap making. Available in 1 lb., 2, 5, and 55 gallon containers
